email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. Following up on our call earlier, I’m pleased to offer a freight rate of $50.75 per ton for the crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel we’re proposing is the MV Ocean Star, a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. Laycan is set for October 15-20. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Would you consider coming down to the low 50s, say $50.25? Also, can you confirm the vessel’s availability for the proposed laycan? Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve checked with the owner, and we can adjust the rate to $50.50 per ton. The MV Ocean Star is still available for the October 15-20 laycan. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.50 sounds reasonable. Let’s proceed with that. Can you confirm the demurrage rate? Also, please send over the full vessel details and laytime terms. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. The demurrage rate is set at $25,000 per day pro rata. I’ve attached the full vessel details and laytime terms for your review. Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Let’s finalize the deal at $50.50 per ton with the agreed laycan and demurrage terms. Please send over the contract for signing. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent. I’ll prepare the contract and send it over shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and looking forward to working together. Best, Sarah
